value.title: Detect objects in images with the Custom Vision service
value.excerpt: Object detection is a form of computer vision in which artificial intelligence (AI) agents can identify and locate specific types of object in an image or camera feed.

images.title: Detect objects in images with the Custom Vision service

value.title: Encrypt network traffic end to end with Azure Application Gateway
value.excerpt: Secure the traffic from your users all the way to your web servers by enabling TLS encryption on Application Gateway.

images.title: Encrypt network traffic end to end with Azure Application Gateway

value.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore Azure services for performing data analytics, and explore the features of Azure Synapse Analytics.

images.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure

value.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn about Azure Table Storage, Azure Blob Storage, Azure File Storage, and Azure Cosmos DB, and explore situations for using them.

images.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure

value.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to provision and configure Azure SQL Database, Azure Database for PostgreSQL, and Azure Database for MySQL.

images.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure

value.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS
value.excerpt: Create a DNS zone for your domain name. Create DNS records to map the URL to an IP address. Test that the domain name resolves to your web server.

images.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS

value.title: Instrument server-side web application code with Application Insights
value.excerpt: Obtain comprehensive diagnostic information from a web app by adding the Application Insights SDK to your server-side code.

images.title: Instrument server-side web application code with Application Insights

value.title: Introduction to AI technology
value.excerpt: This module provides a high-level overview of the primary concepts of AI and the technologies behind it. We then dive into how Microsoft is turning the latest advancements in AI into tools, products, and services that can be leveraged by organizations.

images.title: Introduction to AI technology

value.title: Introduction to App Center
value.excerpt: Characterize the types of services offered by App Center. Describe the use of App Center to build, distribute, test, and analyze usage of apps.

images.title: Introduction to App Center

value.title: Introduction to Python using the datascience library
value.excerpt: Learn about programming and data types in Python

images.title: Introduction to Python using the datascience library

value.title: Introduction to Azure Migrate for server migration
value.excerpt: Discover how Azure Migrate helps you realize the benefits of moving your on-premises VMware or Hyper-V server workloads to Azure infrastructure as a service (IaaS). Learn the process for migrating your workload agent-less, all within the hub.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Migrate for server migration

value.title: Embrace Zero Trust with Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Learn about the Zero Trust model and how to implement Zero Trust into your organization.

value.title: Manage secrets in your server apps with Azure Key Vault
value.excerpt: Your application requires service passwords, connection strings, and other secret configuration values to do its job. Storing and handling secret values is risky, and every usage introduces the possibility of leakage. Azure Key Vault, in combination with managed identities for Azure resources, enables your Azure web app to access secret configuration values easily and securely without needing to store any secrets in your source control or configuration.

images.title: Manage secrets in your server apps with Azure Key Vault

value.title: Monitor data drift with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Changing trends in data over time can reduce the accuracy of the predictions made by a model. Monitoring for this data drift is an important way to ensure your model continues to predict accurately.

images.title: Monitor data drift with Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Work with files and directories in a Node.js app
value.excerpt: Build an app that manipulates files and directories with Node.js.

value.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python
value.excerpt: Import airline arrival data into a Jupyter notebook and use Pandas to clean it. Then, build a machine learning model with Scikit-Learn and use Matplotlib to visualize output.

images.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python

value.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery
value.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your on-premises infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of VMware virtual machines, Hyper-V virtual machines, and physical servers with Azure Site Recovery.

images.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery

value.title: Query relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn about Structured Query Language (SQL), and how you can use it to query, insert, update, and delete data in a relational database.

images.title: Query relational data in Azure

value.title: Route and process data automatically using Logic Apps
value.excerpt: Define a workflow using built-in triggers, actions, and conditional operators. Your workflow will run automatically when data is available, process the data in the cloud, record results in a database, and send email notifications.

images.title: Route and process data automatically using Logic Apps

value.title: Run parallel tasks in Azure Batch with the Azure CLI
value.excerpt: Azure Batch is an Azure service that enables you to run large-scale parallel and high-performance computing (HPC) applications efficiently in the cloud. There's no need to manage or configure infrastructure. Just schedule the job, allocate the resources you need, and let Batch take care of the rest.

images.title: Run parallel tasks in Azure Batch with the Azure CLI

value.title: Secure Azure Active Directory users with Multi-Factor Authentication
value.excerpt: Learn how to use multi-factor authentication with Azure AD to harden your user accounts.

images.title: Secure Azure Active Directory users with Multi-Factor Authentication

value.title: Secure an ASP.NET Core web app with the Identity framework
value.excerpt: Add authentication and authorization to an ASP.NET Core web app using the Identity framework.

images.title: Secure an ASP.NET Core web app with the Identity framework

value.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning to train a model and register it in a workspace.

images.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Transform data by using Azure Stream Analytics
value.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure Stream Analytics jobs to process input data, transform it with a query, and return results.

images.title: Transform data by using Azure Stream Analytics

value.title: Translate speech with the speech service
value.excerpt: Perform speech translation tasks with the speech service to translate spoken text to different languages.

images.title: Translate speech with the speech service

value.title: Use unsupervised learning to analyze unlabeled data
value.excerpt: Use unsupervised learning methods to predict groupings in data. Use variations of k-means clustering and spectral clustering to analyze and visualize difficult data sets.

images.title: Use unsupervised learning to analyze unlabeled data

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore non-relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of database concepts in a cloud environment, get basic skilling in cloud data services, and build your foundational knowledge of cloud data services within Microsoft Azure. You will explore non-relational data offerings, provisioning and deploying non-relational databases, and non-relational data stores with Microsoft Azure.

topItems.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure

topItems.excerpt: Learn how to provision and configure Azure Cosmos DB, Azure Data Lake , Azure Blob Storage, and Azure File Storage.

images.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure

topItems.title: Manage non-relational data stores in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to upload and retrieve data held in Azure Cosmos DB, Azure Blob storage, and Azure File storage.

images.title: Manage non-relational data stores in Azure

value.excerpt: Learn how to configure release pipelines that continuously build, test, and deploy your applications.

images.title: Recommend and design system feedback mechanisms

topItems.title: Route system feedback to development teams
topItems.excerpt: Learn how continuous monitoring and dashboards give you insight into how customers use your software and where patterns of failure occur.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage site reliability.

value.title: Cloud administration basics
value.excerpt:
Learn about the basics of the cloud, including the history, building blocks, and types of services, in preparation for real-world cloud practice on Azure.
In this learning path, you will:

Learn about the history of the cloud, and how it was built
Know the major cloud providers and cloud types
Understand what types of resources are available through the cloud
Recognize cloud service modules
Know the economic benefits of the cloud
Understand digital identity, and how digital identities can be shared and secured

In partnership with Dr. Majd Sakr and Carnegie Mellon University.

topItems.title: Foundations of cloud computing for administrators
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the cloud, including the history, building blocks, and types on your way to becoming a Cloud Administrator.

images.title: Foundations of cloud computing for administrators

topItems.title: Provision and manage cloud services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the different types of resources available on the cloud and the technology behind how they work.

images.title: Provision and manage cloud services

topItems.title: Secure your cloud resources with access control
topItems.excerpt: Learn about digital identities and how they can be managed and synchronized within an organization.

images.title: Secure your cloud resources with access control
Foundations of cloud computing for administrators
